channel.title: RaceHour//NASCAR-Formula 1-GrandAm-IRL
channel.description: RaceHour is an auto racing talk radio program, featuring a perfect blend of music among the spoken segments. The show covers News, Rumors and Opinions from NASCAR, FORMULA 1, GRAND-AM and the INDY RACING LEAGUE//among other racing divisions.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Auto Racing, Talk Radio
channel.itunes:author: RaceHour Radio
channel.itunes:summary: RaceHour is an auto racing talk radio program, featuring a perfect blend of music among the spoken segments. The show covers News, Rumors and Opinions from NASCAR, FORMULA 1, GRAND-AM and the INDY RACING LEAGUE//among other racing divisions.

item.title: RaceHour #66: Hamilton Penalty, Team Audio
item.description: We play the McLaren-to-Lewis team audio which was not provided apparently by McLaren in the post-race hearing after Australia. We believe it answers the question (at least the root of the issue) as to if everything has gone fairly. Plus NASCAR-Martinsville, Logano in 34th--IRL returns, ALMS racing, weekend setup.
item.dc:creator: RaceHour Radio
